### Table of Contents
  * [TITLES & INTERNAL TITLES](#titles)
  * [INTRODUCTION](#introduction)
  * [TECHNOLOGIES](#technologies)
  * [LAUNCH](#launch)

# 1. TITLES & INTERNAL TITLES

* clearly explain what we have, usually project's name
  * i.e. 'simple chat app created with Node.js, Socket.io and MongoDB'

# 2. INTRODUCTION

* what is the projects aim - goal?
* what does the project solve? 2-3 setences
  * traing project? incentive
  * why did you want to create it
  * to learn a particular technology
* shouldn't be too long


# 3. TECHNOLOGIES
* write down the languages used, the libraries and versions
  * Python 3.6
  * R 4.01
  * libraries
    * readr
    * ggplot2 1.0
    * datapasta 0.1

# 4. LAUNCH
* how to run a project
* does a project have minimum hardware requirements
  * setting up a local environment, link to GitHub pages, deployed application on Heroku

## OTHER ELEMENTS TO CONSIDER


### Illustrations
* not necessary buy may aid in aesthetic value

### Scope of Functionalities
* Features;
  * retrieve may of country
* To Do:
  * Make map interactive
  * Allow user input to select country

### Examples of use
* Code Example
  * To generate some feature: put-code-here

### Project status
* if project is in develpment or not
  * planned changes
  * direction of development

### Sources
* This project was inspired by: tutorial, video, blog
  * link to source
* Inspiration
  * who inspired the project, what tutorial, list here

### Other Information
* author
* contact
* social media links
* license under which the code is made available
